title: If flats are constructed there shall be not more than two self-contained flats on each floor, each flat being occupied by one family only
clause_text: If flats are constructed there shall be not more than two self-contained flats on each floor, each flat being occupied by one family only.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If flats are constructed there shall be not more than two self-contained flats on each floor, each flat being occupied by one family only.
